DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare PET measurements of fibrillar amyloid burden using [18F]AZD4694.
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Measurements of Fibrillar Amyloid Burden
DOC.criteria: Male or female, of any race or/ethnicity ECG, vital signs, and clinical laboratory values are within normal limits at enrollment or deemed not clinically significant by the physician Significant recent (within 6 months) history of neurological (including stroke) or psychiatric disorder or substance abuse Participated in a PET study within the last 12 months Pregnancy or lactation
